title: In the Shadows Are People, Weeping and Praying, Surrounded by Others Who Are Exhorting Them . . . (Dans l'ombre des gens pleurent et prient entourés d'autres qui les exhortent . . .) (plate VII) from La Tentation de Saint-Antoine
medium: Lithograph from an illustrated book with 22 lithographs on chine appliqué and 21 wood engravings (including wrapper and table of plates)
